FuncDef: The display ospfv3 next-hop command displays the OSPFv3 next-hop routing table.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an OSPFv3 process ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display ospfv3 next-hop command output can display information about all the OSPFv3 next hops, which helps you troubleshoot OSPFv3 faults.
